website_summaries.verdict: One of the best anti-theft backpacks you can buy, given its unique anti-theft protection.
pros: The TSA-approved backpack includes a TSA lock and a metal wire lock
Wrap-around shoulder straps help relieve weight off your back and shoulders
Buyers appreciate the high-end quality materials
cons: Not very much storage space.Backpack must be opened fully to get items out

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t be happier with the quality, design and functionality of this backpack, besides the obvious safety features, living in NYC and riding the subway either super crowded or late at night, this was a must, very pleased with my purchase, if you have doubts about the price, how much have you spend “tying” different backpacks but they were always missing something? This has it all.
customer_reviews.author: Alan I.

customer_reviews.title: Great Design With Inbuilt Security
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived so proof is in the pudding. But extremely well designed. Feels heavier when lift but when put on, the design makes it feel lightweight. Love the pull-out chain and lock to secure it around a post, the organization inside, and the fact that it can't be cut through. They thot of everything. And it looks professional!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Not capable of really holding anything!
customer_reviews.text: THERE IS NO STORAGE ROOM IN THIS BACKPACK! NONE AT ALL! IT WILL HOLD YOUR LAPTOP AND THE OTHER ITEMS IT COMES WITH, BUT DO NOT EXPECT TO PUT ANYTHING ELSE! BARELY ABLE TO HOLD MY EAR MUFFS, GLOVES AND SCARF WITHOUT NEARLY BURSTING AT THE SEAMS!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Marlow

customer_reviews.title: not good quality
customer_reviews.text: after 1 trip my umbrella bag thing started ripping -- emailed the company - no response. I would not recommend this bag for 100 bucks at all
customer_reviews.author: Vik Mehta

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is awesome! The materials are clearly quality, I could not belived that it would hold all these items. However, it can be done by carefully place and with terris-like skills. It is a strong, inconspicuous bag that no one would imagine all these valuables were being carried. It’s very cool.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Good quality backpack
customer_reviews.text: Good quality backpack. I can put my laptop and iPad mini for a day trip. The size is good and the material is strong and waterproof. The hidden pockets are useful to me as well as those two small bags that it provides. I put small stuffs as chargers, some medicines, lipstick and other accessories in those bags. These make small items more organized. The anti-theft TSA approved lock is also very useful feature. It will be even better if they have other colors to choose.
customer_reviews.author: Yiheng Zhang

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT CARRY-ON FOR INTERNATIONAL TRAVELS
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Wednesday night & delivered Friday late morning; AMAZING! Paid $115-USD after using their $24- coupon (no strings attached). Not positive this bag will hold up intact for years to come; time will tell, however, there is not 1 thing I do not absolutely love about this bag. I travel internationally, extensively and this seems to be the perfect carry-on backpack! Size is also perfect! Any larger and I'd stuff it with junk I really do not need anyhow. VERY HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I patted myself on the back for buying this bag.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this bag for more than 2years and it still looks new. Nothing worn or torn. The bag is very sturdy and it has more room than I initially thought and when I go on a short trip, I put everything I need in this bag and go. Nice job me.
customer_reviews.author: Tae

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this backpack! It’s so comfortable and keeps everything in place. Yes, it may be a smidge pricey, but honestly, every penny is worth it. I highly recommend this backpack. It works great for traveling and also great for plane rides!
customer_reviews.author: CrazycatladyEE92

customer_reviews.title: High quality backpack for laptops
customer_reviews.text: This is a super high quality backpack for laptops. The material is very thick but comfortable to carrying on. Also, there are many small hidden pockets in the backpack which definitely will anti theft. It comes with chargers and cords for you computer. It is a little price but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Crazydreamer

customer_reviews.title: This bag is very strong and sturdy. It is designed thoughtfully and perfectly for laptop ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is very strong and sturdy. It is designed thoughtfully and perfectly for laptop and tablet users. You can fit a few other things such as a book or two. The material used is top quality. The lock, USB charger, and beverage bottle holder are very convenient. It is not designed for traveling with too much stuff. It has my highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Chic Librarian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent book bag!! Worth every penny. Good quality and does its job. Protects my Mac well and everything in side. Love the combo lock,security link, and battery port built into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Agonized and researched for a month over this gift purchase for my wife-- and she loves it. Just the right number of pockets, zippers, and compartments-- holds both her laptop and iPad. Charger pocket and cord were a must-have. Sturdy yet light weight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: sbosak

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy, remove the pouches on the inside to get more space.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, I do like the build of it and the security of it. I'm excited to use it soon for my frequent travels such as to NYC and other places. Looked to get the bobby bag, this seems better since you can lock it down. Have used it to travel on the bus to NYC and around NYC. Had bouncers stop me to check inside it and then say they wanted to get it as well. Compliments all around.
customer_reviews.author: Shippin Aint Eazy

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this bag for a few months now. Its holding up quite well and appears to be of great quality. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Antonio Bueno Roca

customer_reviews.title: The best holiday gift
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine got one. I saw it and really loved it. The design is sleek, very well made. I travel to NY city a lot. This backpack gives me a peace of mind. I like the security chain a lot, because it makes me feel much safer when i sleep on the train back home. The interior space is not that big though. I would say it fits a macbook or a ipad with other my stuffs. I do not have big books. Not sure it will work for students
customer_reviews.author: Ping

customer_reviews.title: high quality material with security feature
customer_reviews.text: The Clickpack is beautifully designed and it has fashion component to it. The material used in this bag is very sturdy with high quality. The compartments inside are thoughtfully designed. Apple Air and cables fit very well inside. The bag itself is light and has a nice shape. I love the lock function as well. Overall, it is a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Bag dissapoints in space
customer_reviews.text: Good design and safety, but lacks space. you'll only have enough space for a single shirt after putting in the toiletry and accessory bag. you wont even have space for a book. This is for VERY light commuters.
customer_reviews.author: Paulizimo

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the lack of pockets
customer_reviews.text: I like the anti-theft features of this bag. I just don't like the lack of pockets for organization on the inside. The included pouches have some crappy hook and loop so they are pretty useless.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: A vault
customer_reviews.text: This is not just a backpack, but also a vault. It is stylish and thick, the only problem is that it limits the space.
customer_reviews.author: Zhen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I was absolutely wrong about this. It has turned out to be the best backpack I have had in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great travel/everyday backpack
customer_reviews.text: Used it as a personal item on flight to NYC. Wore it everyday, walking 10 miles a day. Great backpack. It was comfortable and the charging feature was great for those long stretches when I didn't have a charger. Love the security features. It's not a vault but will prevent petty theft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Bias it is really good, sad though my laptop won't fit.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a very good bag, I was so happy when I got it but when I tried putting my Alienware 15 r4 it does not fit... I wish there could've been a bigger size :( . . . But it is very durable high quality material and oh boy it is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: For laptops & electronic devices only
customer_reviews.text: Looks lovely on the outside but has no room inside!
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Woolley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Quality materials! With tons of features! Light weight and Stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Solla

customer_reviews.title: Love the Backpack
customer_reviews.text: Really great backpack for travel if theft is a concern. So many pockets and additional storage that has been very useful.
customer_reviews.author: 高胜寒

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and tough
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. Everything inside is well protected and stays organized. It’s really holding up to me well . It’s just like new after a full year of abuse!
customer_reviews.author: ihateprofiles

customer_reviews.title: Love the space and the fit on the back
customer_reviews.text: Love the space and the fit on the back. Well made. A negative.. well I guess price point tho I don’t think it’s not worth it just a bit pricy. But as will all things cheap things arnt good and good things arnt cheap
customer_reviews.author: Simba

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and design, however the orgnaiser bag is too small for new macbook pro user . The good things for this bag is the lock, wire locking system and the small bag at the back panel. Space is not enough for business user with documents to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Cck

customer_reviews.title: Love it Small with a bunch of pockets and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it Small with a bunch of pockets and I absolutely love having my usb hook up right in the bag
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend needed a backpack for our recent travels in Europe. It was big, safe, water resistant, and it stood up when you sat it down. Best of all, it gave us a peaceful mind
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for gadgets
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is extremely well made and durable with lots of pockets for different gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: justin pacheco

customer_reviews.title: Clickpak pro
customer_reviews.text: I've went out of country a few times and its withstood rain a jam-packed commute on a train .It's charging port ,hidden zippers and rfid protection make this book bag the only bag I will ever wear now.
customer_reviews.author: J.Batten

customer_reviews.title: Overall I'm very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Product came earlier than expected. Everything that was supposed to come in the product was there. Tested the slash proof, no tears or marks left. The waterproof covering is a God send. Overall I'm very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Vuncannon

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you're buying Korin Design and not a knock off. Love this backpack
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Bee

customer_reviews.title: Is it like this or what
customer_reviews.text: Already cutted the zipper line. Is it like this or what?
customer_reviews.author: Hyo Jeong Kang

customer_reviews.title: Secure, well made, wish it had more space though.
customer_reviews.text: Great secure pack! Only downside is I wish it was roomier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best backpack that I have ever got in my life
customer_reviews.text: This is the best backpack that I have ever got in my life. It doesn’t have the brand name, but it carries the quality from the brand name backpack. it’s light and very durable. very high quality backpack, highliy recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Chen

customer_reviews.title: this is the best value for money
customer_reviews.text: Material looks high class!Decent quality and perspective durable.there’s a lock on top.big space inside 6 small bag plus a big one for laptop.It had an outside USB to connect to a battery pack for convienice. Battery pack of course not included. In nutshell,this is the best value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Lekang Wang

customer_reviews.title: Secure and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Son uses it for school and now we are in the second year. Very durable and reliable and keeps everything of his secure!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Very high-quality material 😍😍
customer_reviews.text: Very very very amazing backpack , It’s really made from high-quality materials , This backpack Is really what I need. Thanks alot.
customer_reviews.author: Trad Assiri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great design and quality! It is a must-have backpack for city tour.
customer_reviews.author: Mu Lin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent back pack!!! Everything it’s with good material, I will looking for more products from Korin
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: nice laptop bag
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag for business utility. If you going for business trip and you need one bag for both laptop and personal stuffs, this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Luo

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack. Matches the description by the seller
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. Matches the description by the seller. I am planning to buy another one of these. I would absolutely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rojita Acharya

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack for travel. Can comfortably fit my 15" laptop, and a bunch of other little things.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Jai

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Kinda small for big travelers ...zipper pulls could be bigger, but overall....love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag and well worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag and well worth the cost...So many pockets, and I love the anti theft lock and the flexible ring to lock the bag from disappearing. Get this bag!
customer_reviews.author: divant.townes

customer_reviews.title: Get one
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this backpack. He has had it for a while and it is still in very good condition. I really like it, too, and may get one for myself. It's pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lag

product_meta.title: Korin Design ClickPack Pro - Anti-theft BackPack Laptop Bag with USB charging port large capacity waterproof TSA travel friendly Black and Grey
product_meta.description:
Korin Design | ClickPack Pro | The Best Functional Anti-theft Backpack

1. Security

 Triple anti-theft protection

 Retractable, metal wire lock ( maximum bearing strength =<50KG)

 YKK double player proof zipper

 Special Slash Resistant Fabric (60% polymer polyethylene fabric | 30% black ultra-fine industrial-level polyester silk | 10% military level glass fiber). Cut resistant level 4

 Comes with rain cover and carrying bag

2. Storage

 Five major storage compartments for pratical pocket-separation

 A dedicated space for Laptop up to 15.6"

 A dedicated space for iPad up to 10"

Reasonale configuration of the storage space

3. Convenience

4. Comfort

 Unique weight reduction System

 Wrap-around shoulder strap helps to relief the weight on your shoulder

 Back support - hugs your back reduce and evenly distribute weight on your back

5. Design

 Custom bi-metallic zippertested over 1000 times to ensure a long lasting and smooth seal

 Spliced, high-density polyester fiber, more comfort and more load bearing

6. Dimension | Weight | Color

 Size - 17.7in x 11.8in x 6.3in (45cm x 30cm x 16cm)

 Net weight - 2.2lbs

 Color - Gray
feature_bullets: Authentic Clickpack Pro anti-theft backpack lets you enjoy the scenery. Good Design Award 2017; iF Design Award 2018. US patent pending

TechTriple anti-theft protection. TSA lock, retractable metal wire lock, YKK double layer, proof zipper, special slash resistant fabric. Five major storage compartments for practical pocket-separation

Unique Weight reduction System, wrap-around shoulder strap helps to relief the weight on your shoulder. The ClickPack hugs your back, reduce and evenly distribute weight on your back. Spliced, high-density polyester fiber, more comfort and more load bearing
Power up while you walk or ride. Charge your electronic devices at any time, any where

Size - 17.7in x 11.8in x 6.3in (45cm x 30cm x 16cm), Shoulder Adjust from 20 to 30 inchs (50cm to 76cm), Net weight - 2.2lbs. Store tablets up to 10" and laptop up to 15.6". Each bag comes with its own packing carton, water resist dust bag and other accessories
